caption: Table 1: Quantitative evaluation on the "celebrity-23" images and DreamBench compositional prompts. -Comp is the model trained only with the face distillation stage.
description: This table presents a quantitative comparison of AdaFace against three baseline methods (PuLID, InstantID, and a version of AdaFace trained only with face distillation) using two metrics: ArcFace similarity (measuring face authenticity) and CLIP-Text similarity (measuring compositionality).  The results are based on images of 23 celebrities evaluated using DreamBench compositional prompts.  The '-Comp' row shows the performance of AdaFace without the composition distillation stage, highlighting the impact of this component on the overall performance.
